text: But Not for Me is a 2015 American musical romantic drama film written and directed by Ryan Carmichael, and starring Marcus Carl Franklin and Elena Urioste. ==Cast== *Marcus Carl Franklin as Will *Elena Urioste as Hope *Maria Vermeulen as Grace *Roger Guenveur Smith as Raymond Little *Tony Crane as Rod *Gregory Lay as Alonzo Donovan *Brett Epstein as Manny ==Production== In a 2013 interview with IndieWire, Ryan Carmichael said of the project: "The aim of this film is to fuse different artistic and intellectual elements to create a unique and dynamic dramatic experience. Starting with hip hop, I wanted to tap into the 'conscious' and improvisatory elements of the music in order to shine a light on some of the socioeconomic issues in America today. Existentialist philosophy comes into play as a mechanism to underscore the experience of Millenials who feel lost in a world where nothing is as they planned it. A 'Postmodernist' narrative structure is employed to frame the revolutionary spirit of the characters hoping to shape the world." ==References== ==External links== * * Category:English-language films Category:2015 films Category:American romantic musical films Category:American romantic drama films Category:American films Category:2010s romantic musical films Category:2015 romantic drama films Category:2015 drama films
title: But Not for Me (2015 film)
